summary: Crypto gift-card style page with real-time BTC pricing, Binance-style UI, and promotional ticker.

existing_features.title: Add a Binance-style top running ticker banner that is visible across the site (all routes) and continuously scrolls a promotional message about a limited-time 50% discount.

Update the ticker message copy to be more engaging and persuasive (English only) while clearly communicating: “Flash 50% discount on all orders”, a limited-time nature, and a special/bonus reason for the offer.

Ensure BTC/USDT pricing is real-time and auto-refreshes, and that all BTC-derived amounts displayed in the UI update according to the latest fetched rate (including any top/summary rate display and the catalog pricing calculations).
Make gift card denomination cards smaller and more Binance-like in layout and density, avoiding a black/brown theme and keeping the existing Binance-style color palette.
Remove the “Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai” branding/link from the footer UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement real-time BTC price auto-refresh and update displayed BTC-derived pricing accordingly (top price + below pricing).
Adjust gift card UI: make cards smaller and update styling to a Binance-like theme (avoid black/brown look).
Remove the “Built with Caffeine AI” branding/footer from the app UI.
Add a top running ticker banner in Binance style with an engaging/persuasive limited-time “Flash 50% discount on all orders” message.
